mapper.select: select emp.emp_id empid,emp.emp_name empname,rec.recd_type rectype, rec.date recdate,rec.time rectime,rec.work_state workstate,rec.id id from employee emp,record rec where emp.emp_id=rec.emp_id and emp.emp_id=#{username} and rec.work_state!='normal' and rec.show="true" order by rec.date desc limit #{startShow},#{pageSize}
